All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Actor
    Actor class abstracts characters in the game that move (e.g.
    Audio
    Class to play sound
    Bug
    Bug class is a type of mob.
    Chap
    The Chap class is a type of actor controlled by the player.
    ChapsChallenge
    The Chaps Challenge class purpose is to control the main game loop, this includes the implementation of the game states and what the game should do when the state is entered or exited.
    Controls
    Controls class, the buttons in the menu and the key press functionality is all covered in this class.
    ExitLockTile
    The ExitLockTile class represents the tile that is placed before the Exit tile.
    ExitTile
    The ExitTile class represents the tile that will complete the level when moved to.
    FreeTile
    The FreeTile class represents a tile that can be moved to freely without any requirements.
    GameObject
    Game Object is the base interface to ensure every object that is part of the game has position and an image string
    GameVisuals
    Class to draw tiles, character, items and mobs Can draw the text from info tiles aswell
    GameWorld
    The GameWorld is the main class in the maze package that has functionality for changing and checking the state of objects within the game Provides functionality for setting and getting objects within the game.
    GUI
    GUI class is all the visualization except for the renderer which takes care of the game board.
    HelpMenuListener
    The help menu which containers the game information, control information and extra information.
    IllegalMoveException
    IllegalMoveException is custom runtime exception used for when moves are not permitted
    InfoTile
    The InfoTile class represents a tile that if moved to will display level information.
    InventoryPanel
    The inventory panel which will display the information for the player to use while playing the game.
    Item
    Item class stores objects that can be picked up by chap such as keys.
    Key
    The movement keys for Chap to move around the maze.
    KeyTile
    The KeyTile class represents a tile that holds a key item that can be picked up.
    LoadJSON
    LoadJSON class is responsible for parsing the JSON file and returning the moves as an arraylist and the level number as an int to the Replay class.
    LockedDoorTile
    The LockedDoorTile class represents a tile that can be unlocked and moved to if the chap has the required key.
    Maze
    Maze class stores the grid of tiles in the game.
    Mob
    Mob class is a type of actor that moves around the maze on its own from a specified path.
    MobManager
    MobManager stores all of the mobs in the maze and manages their movement.
    Move
    The Move enum holds values that represent how actors can move.
    Persistence  
    PlayerControls
    The controls for the player to move Chap around the maze, separated from the other controls class to stop over stepping around the maze.
    Record
    Record class stores all moves passed from the application class.
    Replay
    Replay class stores an arraylist of player moves loaded from JSON files (handled by the LoadJSON class) methods within this class handle iterating this arraylist and passing moves and time to the application class
    Tile
    The Tile class abstracts tiles within the maze.
    TreasureTile
    The TreasureTile class represents a tile that contains a treasure which can be collected if chap moves onto the tile.
    WallTile
    The WallTile class represents a tile which cannot be moved to by chap.
